description:
Luffy`s fist of fire puts Hordy down for the count, and the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of the remaining Fish-Man Pirates. Meanwhile, a very big boat looms overhead!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Konshin no Ichigeki! Red Hawk Sakuretsu
Luffy donne tout ce qu’il a. L’explosion du Red Hawk !
Luffy`s All-Out Attack! Red Hawk Blasts!
Вложив всю силу в удар! Взрыв Красного Ястреба!
هجوم لوفي الشّامل! انفجار الصّقر الأحمر!
ルフィ渾身の一撃! 火拳銃[レッドホーク]炸裂
